name: Foundations of Education
description: Explore the history, philosophy, and sociology of education and their influence on modern teaching.

name: Learning How to Learn
description: Discover powerful mental tools to help you master tough subjects and improve study techniques.

name: Instructional Design for Online Learning
description: Learn how to design engaging and effective online learning experiences.

name: Classroom Management Strategies
description: Techniques for maintaining a positive learning environment and managing student behavior.

name: Educational Psychology
description: Understand how students learn and apply psychological principles to improve teaching effectiveness.

name: Assessment and Evaluation in Education
description: Learn how to measure and evaluate learning outcomes effectively.

name: Special Needs and Inclusive Education
description: Explore how to create inclusive classrooms that accommodate all learners.

name: Educational Leadership and Policy
description: Develop leadership skills for managing schools and shaping education policy.

name: Technology in Education
description: Integrate digital tools and platforms into teaching to enhance student engagement.

name: Curriculum Development and Design
description: Learn how to plan, organize, and evaluate curricula across educational levels.

name: Early Childhood Education
description: Focus on developmental stages, play-based learning, and early pedagogy principles.

name: Research Methods in Education
description: Gain skills in educational research design, data collection, and analysis.
